title: Berkeley's I School. Fab or flop?
content:
Hi all,  
I’m wondering if any of you know much about Berkeley’s i school (school of information) Master’s Program. It sounds interesting and was mentioned during my graphic design class as a possible option for grad school.

Does any one know about this program? Fab or flop, or somewhere inbetween?

Thanks :-)

 [‹ Birthday Wishes to Mister Retro!](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121060743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32864 "Go to previous forum topic") [Who wants/needs a Glyph Palette in Photoshop? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121060743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32683 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TypoGirlie12

comments.content: Almost everything at the grad level offered at Berzerkley has a good rep (my grad school faculty adviser did his PhD there) — it’s hard to believe that this would be a dud....
